Title: Relates to providing a municipal renewable energy system siting database
Summary: Provides a municipal renewable energy system siting database for municipalities interested in siting renewable energy systems on available land within their boundaries; allows municipalities to publish their renewable energy goals and facilitate the development of renewable energy systems.
LawCode: Add ยง1885, amd ยง1902, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to providing a municipal renewable energy system siting database
